summary.span: 管理 Web 與應用程式服務的 ASP.NET Ajax 指令碼程式庫和指令碼檔、局部網頁呈現及用戶端 Proxy 類別產生。

span.span: Manages ASP.NET Ajax script libraries and script files, partial-page rendering, and client proxy class generation for Web and application services.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [在局部網頁呈現Partial-Page Rendering](#partial_page_rendering) - [ScriptManager 控制項使用主版頁面、 使用者控制項和其他子元件Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components](#using_the_scriptmanager_control_with_master_pages__user_controls__and_other_child_components) - [指令碼管理和註冊Script Management and Registration](#script_management_and_registration) - [Web 服務參考Web Service References](#web_service_references) - [當地語系化Localization](#localization) - [錯誤處理Error Handling](#error_handling) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是在 ASP.NET Ajax 功能的核心。The control is central to Ajax functionality in ASP.NET. 控制管理頁面上的所有 ASP.NET Ajax 資源。The control manages all ASP.NET Ajax resources on a page. 這包括下載[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]瀏覽器及協調使用啟用的部分頁面更新指令碼控制項。This includes downloading [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] scripts to the browser and coordinating partial-page updates that are enabled by using controls. 此外，控制項可讓您執行下列動作：In addition, the control enables you to do the following: - 註冊局部網頁更新與相容的指令碼。Register script that is compatible with partial-page updates. 若要管理您的指令碼與核心程式庫之間的相依性之後, 載入您註冊的任何指令碼[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]指令碼。In order to manage dependencies between your script and the core library, any script that you register is loaded after the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] script. - 指定是否釋放或偵錯指令碼會傳送至瀏覽器。Specify whether release or debug scripts are sent to the browser. - 註冊 Web 服務的 Web 服務方法來提供存取從指令碼控制項。Provide access to Web service methods from script by registering Web services with the control. - 提供的註冊這些服務與 ASP.NET 驗證、 角色和設定檔的存取用戶端指令碼的應用程式服務控制項。Provide access to ASP.NET authentication, role, and profile application services from client script by registering these services with the control. - 啟用特定文化特性和顯示的 ECMAScript (JavaScript)、 瀏覽器中的函式。Enable culture-specific display of ECMAScript (JavaScript) , , and functions in the browser. - 使用存取當地語系化資源內嵌指令碼檔案或獨立的指令碼檔案屬性控制項。Access localization resources for embedded script files or for stand-alone script files by using the property of the control. - 註冊伺服器控制項的實作或介面控制項，以便在呈現用戶端元件和行為所需的指令碼。Register server controls that implement the or interfaces with the control so that script required by client components and behaviors is rendered. ## 在局部網頁呈現Partial-Page Rendering 支援局部網頁呈現 ASP.NET 網頁的能力受到下列因素：The ability of an ASP.NET page to support partial-page rendering is controlled by the following factors: - 控制項的屬性必須是`true`（預設值）。The control's property must be `true` (the default value). - 必須有至少一個頁面上的控制項。There must be at least one control on the page. - 屬性必須是`true`（預設值）。The property must be `true` (the default value). 如果屬性未明確設定，其值會根據瀏覽器功能。If the property is not set explicitly, its value is based on browser capabilities. 您可以覆寫的值屬性在執行階段期間或之前的頁面事件。You can override the value of the property at run time during or before the page's event. 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性頁之後已發生事件，擲回例外狀況。If you try to change this property after the page's event has occurred, an exception is thrown. 支援局部網頁呈現時，控制項呈現的指令碼來啟用非同步回傳及部分頁面更新。When partial-page rendering is supported, the control renders script to enable asynchronous postbacks and partial-page updates. 使用指定的頁面，即可更新區域控制項。The regions of the page to be updated are designated by using controls. 控制處理非同步回傳，並重新整理只網頁的區域，必須更新。The control handles the asynchronous postbacks and refreshes only the regions of the page that have to be updated. 如需有關局部網頁呈現的詳細資訊，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about partial-page rendering, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 多個條件，讓更新的詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)。For more information about the conditions that cause an update, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a). ## ScriptManager 控制項使用主版頁面、 使用者控制項和其他子元件Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components 分頁只能包含一個其階層架構中的控制項。A page can contain only one control in its hierarchy. 若要註冊服務與巢狀的頁面、 使用者控制項或元件的指令碼時已有父系分頁控制，請使用控制項。To register services and scripts for nested pages, user controls, or components when the parent page already has a control, use the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項使用主版頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1c974d5-a6b2-4bb3-a3cc-61dd9dc0e1d6)For more information, see [Using the UpdatePanel Control with Master Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1c974d5-a6b2-4bb3-a3cc-61dd9dc0e1d6) ## 指令碼管理和註冊Script Management and Registration 控制項可讓您註冊指令碼，接著會轉譯為頁面的一部分。The control enables you to register script that is then rendered as part of the page. 控制項註冊方法可分成下列三個類別：The control registration methods can be broken into the following three categories: - 保證的註冊方法上的指令碼相依性[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]進行維護。Registration methods that guarantee that script dependencies on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] are maintained. - 不是依存於的註冊方法[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]，但該相容控制項。Registration methods that are not dependent on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)], but that are compatible with controls. - 註冊方法支援使用控制項。Registration methods that support working with controls. 如需如何建立和使用 ASP.NET Ajax 指令碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[建立自訂用戶端指令碼使用 Microsoft Ajax Library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/285e3a65-b42e-42c5-952d-baf184057899)。For more information about how to create and use Ajax script in ASP.NET, see [Creating Custom Client Script by Using the Microsoft Ajax Library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/285e3a65-b42e-42c5-952d-baf184057899). ### 註冊相依於 Microsoft Ajax 程式庫的指令碼Registering Script That Is Dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library 您可以使用下列方法可確保任何相依項目上的方式註冊指令碼檔案[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]進行維護。You can use the following methods to register script files in a way that guarantees that any dependencies on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] are maintained. |方法Method|定義Definition| |------------|----------------| ||註冊的伺服器控制項，實作用來定義用戶端物件的介面。Registers a server control that implements the interface that is used to define a client object. 控制項呈現支援用戶端物件的指令碼。The control renders script that supports the client object.| ||註冊的伺服器控制項，實作用來定義用戶端物件的介面。Registers a server control that implements the interface that is used to define a client object. 控制項呈現支援用戶端物件的指令碼。The control renders script that supports the client object.| ### 註冊部分頁面更新相容的指令碼Registering Partial-Page Update Compatible Scripts 您可以使用下列方法來註冊指令碼檔案不是依存於[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相容，但控制項。You can use the following methods to register script files that are not dependent on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] but that are compatible with controls. 這些方法會對應至類似方法控制項。These methods correspond to similar methods of the control. 如果您轉譯指令碼內使用的控制，請確定您呼叫的方法控制項。If you are rendering script for use inside an control, make sure that you call the methods of the control. |方法Method|定義Definition| |------------|----------------| ||將值加入至 JavaScript 陣列。Adds a value to a JavaScript array. 如果陣列不存在，則會建立它。If the array does not exist, it is created.| ||呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後`
`標記。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 指定指令碼作為字串參數。The script is specified as a string parameter.| ||呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後``標記。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 設定來指定指令碼內容`src`屬性設定為指向指令碼檔案的 URL。The script content is specified by setting the `src` attribute to a URL that points to a script file.| ||呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後``標記。Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `` tag. 指令碼內容指定的組件中的資源名稱。The script content is specified with a resource name in an assembly. `src`屬性會自動填入 URL 從組件中擷取的已命名的指令碼為 HTTP 處理常式呼叫。The `src` attribute is automatically populated with a URL by a call to an HTTP handler that retrieves the named script from the assembly.| ||呈現指定控制項的標記中的自訂名稱/值屬性組 (expando)。Renders a custom name/value attribute pair (an expando) in the markup for a specified control.| ||會呈現隱藏的欄位。Renders a hidden field.| ||註冊會在回應中執行指令碼`form`項目的`submit`事件。Registers a script that is executed in response to the `form` element's `submit` event. `onSubmit`屬性將會參考指定的指令碼。The `onSubmit` attribute references the specified script.| ||呈現頁面的右之前啟動指令碼區塊``標記。Renders a startup script block just before the page's closing `` tag. 要轉譯的指令碼已指定為字串參數。The script to render is specified as a string parameter.| 當您註冊方法時，您會指定該指令碼的類型/金鑰組。When you register methods, you specify a type/key pair for that script. 如果尚未註冊具有相同的型別/金鑰組的指令碼，新的指令碼未註冊。If a script with the same type/key pair is already registered, a new script is not registered. 同樣地，如果您註冊的指令碼的資源類型/名稱組已經存在，則`script`參考該資源的項目不會加入一次。Similarly, if you register a script with a type/resource name pair that already exists, the `script` element that references the resource is not added again. 當您註冊 expando 屬性的先前註冊的屬性時，則會擲回例外狀況。When you register an expando attribute of a previously registered attribute, an exception is thrown. 允許的陣列值的重複註冊。Duplicate registration of array values is allowed. 當您呼叫或方法，避免註冊執行內嵌函式的指令碼。When you call the or the method, avoid registering script that executes inline functions. 相反地，註冊指令碼，其中包含如事件處理常式的函式定義或自訂類別定義，應用程式。Instead, register script that contains function definitions like event handlers or custom class definitions for your application. ### UpdatePanel 控制項的註冊方法Registration Methods for UpdatePanel Controls 您可以使用下列方法，當您使用自訂部分頁面更新控制項。You can use the following methods to customize partial-page updates when you use controls. |方法Method|定義Definition| |------------|----------------| ||將控制項註冊為非同步回傳的觸發程序。Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.| ||在局部網頁呈現期間，將自訂資料傳送給控制項。Sends custom data to controls during partial-page rendering.| ||註冊控制項內部的 dispose 指令碼控制項。Registers a dispose script for a control that is inside an control. 更新或刪除 控制項時，即會執行該指令碼。The script is executed when the control is updated or deleted. Dispose 方法用於用戶端元件屬於[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]且無法再使用元件時，釋放資源。The dispose method is used for client components that are part of the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used.| ||將控制項註冊完整頁面的回傳的觸發程序。Registers a control as a trigger for a full postback. 這個方法用於控制項另外執行非同步回傳的控制項。This method is used for controls inside an control that would otherwise perform asynchronous postbacks.| ## Web 服務參考Web Service References 您可以註冊 Web 服務呼叫從用戶端指令碼，藉由建立物件並將它加入至集合控制項。You can register a Web service to be called from client script by creating a object and adding it to the collection of the control. ASP.NET 會為每個產生的用戶端 proxy 物件物件存放至集合。ASP.NET generates a client proxy object for each object in the collection. 您可以程式設計方式加入物件加入至在執行階段註冊 Web 服務的集合。You can programmatically add objects to the collection to register Web services at run time. 如需如何存取指令碼中的 Web 服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[公開 Web 服務與 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8)和[從 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼呼叫 Web 服務](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc06c224-f01a-45be-94af-bd71afbc07b0)。For more information about how to access Web services in script, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8) and [Calling Web Services from Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc06c224-f01a-45be-94af-bd71afbc07b0). ## 當地語系化Localization 控制項產生參考在呈現的頁面指向適當的當地語系化指令碼檔案，也就是其中一個內嵌於組件或獨立的指令碼檔案中的指令碼檔案。The control generates references in the rendered page that point to the appropriate localized script files, which are either script files embedded in assemblies or stand-alone script files. 當屬性設定為`true`、控制項擷取目前的文化特性的當地語系化的資源 （例如當地語系化的字串），如果有的話。When the property is set to `true`, the control retrieves localized resources (such as localized strings) for the current culture, if they exist. 控制項提供下列功能，以使用當地語系化的資源：The control provides the following functionality for using localized resources: - **指令碼會內嵌在組件的檔案**。**Script files that are embedded in an assembly**. 控制項會決定將傳送至瀏覽器的文化特性或後援文化特性的指令碼檔案。The control determines which culture-specific or fallback-culture script file to send to the browser. 其做法是使用特定文化特性組件的屬性、 封裝與組件和 UI 文化特性的瀏覽器 （如果有的話） 的資源。It does this by using the culture-specific assembly attribute, the resources packaged with the assembly, and the UI culture of the browser (if any). - **獨立的指令碼檔案**。**Stand-alone script files**. 控制項定義的使用支援的 UI 文化特性清單屬性物件。The control defines the list of UI cultures that are supported by using the property of the object. - **在偵錯模式**。**In debug mode**. 控制項嘗試呈現特定文化特性的指令碼檔案包含偵錯資訊。The control tries to render a culture-specific script file that contains debug information. 例如，如果頁面是在偵錯模式中，目前的文化特性設定為 en-us MX 控制項呈現的指令碼檔案，例如其名稱`scriptname`.en-MX.debug.js，如果檔案存在。For example, if the page is in debug mode and the current culture is set to en-MX, the control renders a script file that has a name such as `scriptname`.en-MX.debug.js, if the file exists. 如果檔案不存在，則會呈現適當的後援文化特性的偵錯檔案If the file does not exist, the debug file for the appropriate fallback culture is rendered 如需如何當地語系化資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[當地語系化資源元件程式庫概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e6b15435-57c1-4dd1-9bd3-5d4c509685bb)。For more information about how to localize resources, see [Localizing Resources for Component Libraries Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e6b15435-57c1-4dd1-9bd3-5d4c509685bb). ## 錯誤處理Error Handling 在非同步回傳期間發生頁面錯誤時就會引發事件。When a page error occurs during asynchronous postbacks, the event is raised. 在該伺服器上的錯誤會傳送至用戶端的方式取決於屬性，屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。The way in which errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the property, the property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項的自訂錯誤處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e15e7ffb-e4b2-4a89-b99e-16624a5861d0)。For more information, see [Customizing Error Handling for UpdatePanel Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e15e7ffb-e4b2-4a89-b99e-16624a5861d0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例會顯示不同的方案使用控制項。The following examples show different scenarios for using the control. **啟用局部網頁更新****Enabling Partial-Page Updates** 下列範例示範如何使用啟用局部網頁更新控制項。The following example shows how to use the control to enable partial-page updates. 在此範例中，和控制項位於控制項。In this example, a and a control are inside an control. 根據預設，值屬性是，和值屬性是`true`。By default, the value of the property is , and the value of the property is `true`. 因此，子控制項的面板會導致在非同步回傳。Therefore, child controls of the panel cause an asynchronous postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample1VB.aspx#1)] **處理部分頁面更新錯誤，並註冊指令碼****Handling Partial-Page Update Errors and Registering Script** 下列範例會示範如何提供自訂錯誤處理部分頁面更新期間。The following example shows how to provide custom error handling during partial-page updates. 根據預設，在局部網頁更新期間發生錯誤時就會顯示 JavaScript 訊息方塊。By default, when an error occurs during partial-page updates, a JavaScript message box is displayed. 這個範例示範如何使用自訂錯誤處理所提供的處理常式事件，以及設定事件處理常式中的屬性。This example demonstrates how to use custom error handling by providing a handler for the event, and by setting the property in the event handler. 您也可以設定屬性來指定在局部網頁更新期間發生錯誤時，如何使用 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。You can also set the property to specify how the custom errors section of the Web.config file is used when an error occurs during partial-page updates. 在此範例中，預設值的屬性使用。In this example, the default value of the property is used. 這表示，如果 Web.config 檔案包含的項目，該項目會決定顯示錯誤的方式。This means that if the Web.config file contains a element, that element determines how errors are displayed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[customErrors 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/288c32e2-df1f-4548-abda-de6b4cb989a6)。For more information, see [customErrors Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/288c32e2-df1f-4548-abda-de6b4cb989a6). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnAsyncPostBackError/VB/default.aspx#1)] **全球化的日期和時間，會顯示在瀏覽器****Globalizing the Date and Time That Are Displayed in the Browser** 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，因此，該用戶端指令碼會在瀏覽器中顯示的特定文化特性的日期和時間。The following example shows how to set the property so that client script can display a culture-specific date and time in the browser. 在範例中，`Culture`指示詞屬性設為`auto`。In the example, the `Culture` attribute of the directive is set to `auto`. 如此一來，目前的瀏覽器設定中指定的第一個語言會決定的文化特性和 UI 文化特性的頁面。As a result, the first language that is specified in the current browser settings determines the culture and UI culture for the page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定 ASP.NET Web 網頁全球化的文化特性和 UI 文化特性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76091f86-f967-4687-a40f-de87bd8cc9a0)。For more information, see [How to: Set the Culture and UI Culture for ASP.NET Web Page Globalization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76091f86-f967-4687-a40f-de87bd8cc9a0). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization/VB/default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化所使用的內部欄位追蹤頁面、 控制和部署資訊的控制項。This constructor initializes the internal fields that are used by the control to track page, control, and deployment information.

summary.span: 建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

span.span: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些方法多載可讓您定義 瀏覽器中的 伺服器狀態，以及 （選擇性） 之記錄項目的標題。These method overloads enable you to define server state, and optionally the title of the history entry in the browser. 當您建立記錄點時，序列化和加密的資料會附加至網頁的 URL 和項目包含在瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack. 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9)。For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9).

Public Sub AddHistoryPoint (state As NameValueCollection, title As String)

param.name: state
param.span: 索引鍵/值組集合，內含該狀態的資料。

span.span: A collection of key/value pairs that contain the data for the state.

param.name: title
param.span: 文字，這段文字將加入瀏覽器記錄堆疊做為此狀態的標題。

span.span: The text that will be added to the browser's history stack as the title for this state.

summary.span: 透過使用指定的狀態資料集合和狀態標題，進行建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

span.span: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack, using the specified state data collection and state title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立記錄點，當您想要儲存的狀態資料的多個索引鍵/值組。Use this method to create a history point when you want to save more than one key/value pair for the state data. 當您建立記錄點時，序列化和加密的資料會附加至網頁的 URL 和項目包含在瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack. 如果`title`參數是`null`，為狀態中的項目記錄堆疊的標題會使用網頁的標題。If the `title` parameter is `null`, the title of the Web page is used as the title of the state entry in the history stack. 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9)。For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件，這個屬性就會傳回代表已向頁面驗證服務。The object that is returned by this property represents the authentication service that is registered with the page. 驗證服務可以在定義控制項或在相關聯控制項。The authentication service can be defined in the control or in an associated control. 您可以使用 ASP.NET 驗證服務，或使用自訂驗證服務。You can use the ASP.NET authentication service or use a custom authentication service. 您也可以包括在標記中加入自訂服務`AuthenticationService`元素內`asp:ScriptManager`元素在頁面上，如下列範例所示。You can add the custom service in markup by including an `AuthenticationService` element inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 您可以也以程式設計方式設定物件。You can also programmatically configure the object. 服務會向期間網頁的控制項生命週期階段。Services are registered with the control during the page's life-cycle stage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將靜態網頁方法加入至 ASP.NET 網頁，並將它們標示為 Web 方法。You can add static page methods to an ASP.NET page and mark them as Web methods. 然後您可以從指令碼呼叫這些方法，就如同 Web 服務，但是沒有建立個別的.asmx 檔案的一部分。You can then call these methods from script as if they were part of a Web service, but without creating a separate .asmx file. 若要建立在頁面上的 Web 方法，匯入命名空間和新增屬性設定為每個您想要公開的靜態方法。To create Web methods on a page, import the namespace and add a attribute to each static method that you want to expose. 方法必須標記為 public。The methods must be marked public. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[公開 Web 服務與 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8)。For more information, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8).

summary.span: 取得值，該值指出是否要呈現用戶端指令碼程式庫的偵錯版本。

span.span: if the current request is executing in debug mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`false`任一下列條件為 true 時：The property returns `false` when any one of the following conditions is true: - 組態檔中，項目中`retail`屬性設為`true`。In the element of the configuration file, the `retail` attribute is set to `true`. 這會覆寫所有其他設定。This overrides all other settings. - 屬性設定為`Auto`或`Inherit`，而且在不啟用偵錯`compilation`應用程式根目錄 Web.config 檔案區段。The property is set to `Auto` or to `Inherit`, and debugging is not enabled in the `compilation` section of the application-root Web.config file. - 屬性設定為 `Release`。The property is set to `Release`. > [!NOTE] > `debug`指示詞屬性不會影響已啟用 Ajax 的 ASP.NET 應用程式。The `debug` attribute of the directive does not affect Ajax-enabled ASP.NET applications. 控制項使用只有設定 Web.config 檔案中，然後在其和屬性，以決定是否要呈現偵錯指令碼。The control uses only the settings in the Web.config file and in its and properties to determine whether to render debug scripts. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[偵錯和追蹤 Ajax 應用程式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375)。For more information, see [Debugging and Tracing Ajax Applications Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定如何在指令碼相對於網頁 UI 的標記會載入集合。The property determines how scripts in the collection are loaded relative to the markup for the page UI. 當屬性是`true`、`script`項目會呈現在載入網頁的 UI 的標記之前。When the property is `true`, a `script` element is rendered before the page's UI markup is loaded. 在此案例中，UI 項目所定義的指令碼中 UI 會正常載入時。In this scenario, if UI elements are defined in scripts, the UI will be fully functional when it loads. 不過，如果指令碼存取的執行個體有尚未建立在標記中的 UI 項目，就可能會發生錯誤。However, if the script accesses UI elements in the markup for which instances have not yet been created, an error might occur. 若要確定 UI 項目會載入前存取它們，處理之事件的類別。To make sure that UI elements are loaded before you access them, handle the event of the class. 當屬性是`false`、`script`項目會呈現在呈現網頁的 UI 標記之後。When the property is `false`, a `script` element is rendered after the page's UI markup is rendered. 在此案例中，UI 載入速度更快，但它可能無法完全正常運作如果定義其他 UI 項目的指令碼尚未完成載入。In this scenario, the UI loads more quickly, but it might not be fully functional if scripts that define additional UI elements have not finished loading. 未設定這個屬性為`true`如果您設定至`true`已經。Do not set this property to `true` if you set to `true` already.

summary.span: 當使用者按一下瀏覽器的 [上一頁] 或 [下一頁] 按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the browser's **Back** or **Forward** button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下瀏覽器的**回** 按鈕，瀏覽器巡覽先前檢視過的 Url，可以包含具有記錄點狀態資料的 Url。When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data. 如果在網頁中的用戶端程式碼偵測到此 URL 包含記錄狀態資料，而進行要求 [伺服器] 頁面。If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page. 這可以做為回傳事件，而伺服器控制項引發`Navigate`事件。This acts as a postback event, and the server control raises the `Navigate` event. 您可以處理這個事件，並重新建立使用傳遞的狀態資料與事件的 視需要在 Web 應用程式頁面。You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法，登錄具有局部網頁呈現，且相容的用戶端指令碼陣列之中未包含任何[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。You use the method to register a client script array that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies. 這個方法會註冊陣列時`control`代表內部的控制項正在更新的控制項。This method registers the array when `control` represents a control that is inside an control that is being updated. 若要註冊陣列的每次非同步回傳發生時，使用這個方法多載。To register an array every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果您想要註冊陣列，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊陣列的初始頁面在呈現期間，一次使用方法類別。If you want to register an array that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the array only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 您可以取得的參考物件從頁的屬性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 方法會判斷是否具有名稱中指定的陣列`arrayName`參數已經註冊過了。The method determines whether an array with the name that is specified in the `arrayName` parameter is already registered. 因此，方法會將指定的值如果`arrayValue`。If so, the method adds the values specified in `arrayValue`. 因為要註冊陣列以基礎類別，允許重複的項目。Because the array to be registered is based on the class, duplicates are allowed. 如果已註冊的陣列中的名稱與`arrayName`不存在，在建立陣列及其包含的值`arrayValue`加入其中。If a registered array with the name in `arrayName` does not exist, the array is created and the values in `arrayValue` are added to it. 若要包含在陣列中的字串常值，使用單引號 （'） 或逸出雙引號內 (\\") 中`arrayValue`。To include string literals in the array, use single quotation marks (') or escaped double quotation marks (\\") in `arrayValue`. 請注意，JavaScript 會將逗號 （，） 做為陣列中的分隔符號。Note that JavaScript treats a comma (,) as a delimiter in an array. 您可以藉由傳遞以逗號分隔的字串中指定多個陣列值`arrayValue`。You can specify multiple array values by passing a comma-delimited string in `arrayValue`. 以逗號分隔兩個項目`arrayValue`就相當於呼叫方法兩次，一次，每個項目。Separating two items with a comma in `arrayValue` is equivalent to calling the method two times, one time for each item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您將 Web 伺服器控制項登錄為觸發程序，使他們執行非同步回傳而不是同步回傳。The method enables you to register Web server controls as triggers so that they perform an asynchronous postback instead of a synchronous postback. 當屬性控制設為 `true` （此為預設值），回傳控制項控制項就會自動註冊為非同步回傳的控制項。When the property of an control is set to `true` (which is the default), postback controls inside the control are automatically registered as asynchronous postback controls. 使用方法，登錄之外的控制項為觸發程序的非同步回傳，並可能會更新更新面板的內容控制項。Use the method to register controls outside an control as triggers for asynchronous postbacks, and to potentially update the content of an update panel. 若要更新以程式設計方式控制，請呼叫方法。To update an control programmatically, call the method. 您可以新增觸發程序以宣告方式使用`Triggers`元素控制項。You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the control. 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，使用設計工具的**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合編輯器** 對話方塊。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何呼叫方法，登錄控制，讓它導致更新控制項的內容。The following example shows how to call the method to register a control so that it causes an update of an control's content. 控制項不是內部控制項。The control is not inside the control. 會顯示兩個按鈕：`Button1`和`Button2`。Two buttons are shown: `Button1` and `Button2`. `Button1` 重新整理面板的內容和`Button2`重新整理整頁。`Button1` refreshes the content of the panel, and `Button2` refreshes the whole page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/CS/ScriptManager1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/VB/ScriptManager1VB.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何呼叫方法，登錄使用者控制項，以便它會導致更新控制項的內容。The following example shows how to call the method to register a user control so that it causes an update of an control's content. 第一個範例顯示使用使用者控制項的網頁。The first example shows a page using the user control. 第二個範例顯示的使用者控制項。The second example shows the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/CS/ScriptManager2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl/VB/ScriptManager2VB.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法，在局部網頁更新登錄頁面或頁面參與的一部分的用戶端指令碼檔。You use the method to register a client script file for a page or part of a page that is participating in partial-page updates. 使用此方法註冊的用戶端指令碼檔案會傳送至網頁時，才`control`代表內部的控制項正在更新的控制項。Client script files that are registered by using this method are sent to the page only when the `control` represents a control that is inside an control that is being updated. 若要註冊指令碼檔案每次非同步回傳發生時，使用這個方法多載。To register a script file every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果您想要註冊指令碼區塊，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊指令碼區塊一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間使用方法類別。If you want to register a script block that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script block only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 您可以取得的參考物件從頁的屬性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 方法註冊用戶端指令碼檔案，頁面上的所呈現`script`其開頭的標記包含的項目`src`屬性。The method registers a client script file on the page by rendering a `script` element whose opening tag contains a `src` attribute. `url`參數用來設定`src`屬性。The `url` parameter is used to set the `src` attribute. 若要解決的 Url，請使用方法。To resolve URLs, use the method. 這個方法會使用針對呼叫解析路徑的 URL 的內容。This method uses the context of the URL it is called for to resolve the path. 同時和方法轉譯至瀏覽器的指令碼檔案。Both the and methods render script files to the browser. 如果已轉譯具有相同的型別 （適用於指令碼檔案） 的索引鍵或相同的型別和資源名稱 （適用於內嵌的資源） 的指令碼，指令碼不會轉譯一次。If a script with the same type and key (for a script file) or the same type and resource name (for an embedded resource) is already rendered, the script is not rendered again. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以從伺服器傳送資料至用戶端非同步回傳，不論是否接收資料的控制項位於控制項。Use the method to send data from the server to the client during asynchronous postbacks, regardless of whether the control receiving the data is inside an control. 只能在非同步回傳期間呼叫方法。The method can be called only during an asynchronous postback. 若要判斷是否為非同步回傳，使用屬性。To determine whether a postback is asynchronous, use the property. 這個方法會叫用接受名為參數的多載`isJsonSerialized`設為`false`。This method invokes the overload that takes a parameter named `isJsonSerialized` that is set to `false`. 當`isJsonSerialized`參數設定為`false`，字串不會序列化為 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON)。When the `isJsonSerialized` parameter is set to `false`, the string is not serialized as JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). 如需 JSON 格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[JSON 簡介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297)網站。For more information about the JSON format, see the [Introducing JSON](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297) Web site. 包含已註冊的資料項目方法可以存取期間的用戶端指令碼、 和物件的事件。The data items that are registered with the method can be accessed in client script during the , , and events of the object. 當您處理這些事件時，事件引數物件中傳遞自訂資料。When you handle these events, the custom data is passed in an event argument object. 比方說，如果您提供的事件處理常式，則會傳遞自訂資料在類別中，會公開屬性。For example, if you provide a handler for the event, the custom data is passed in the class, which exposes a property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將資料傳送至兩個非同步回傳期間的頁面上的控制項。The following example shows how to send data to two controls on a page during an asynchronous postback. 控制項不是內部控制項。The controls are not inside an control. > [!NOTE] > 此範例中傳送的資料是僅供說明。The data that is sent in this example is for illustration only. 在真實世界的應用程式，您會使用方法，以從伺服器傳送自訂資料。In a real-world application, you would use the method to send custom data from the server. span.span: Sends custom data to a control during partial-page rendering, and indicates whether the data is in JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用方法，以從伺服器傳送資料至用戶端非同步回傳，不論是否接收資料的控制項位於控制項。You use the method to send data from the server to the client during asynchronous postbacks, regardless of whether the control receiving the data is inside an control. 如果`dataItem`您註冊的參數`control`不會序列化為 JSON，設定`isJsonSerialized`參數`false`。If the `dataItem` parameter that you register for `control` is not serialized as JSON, set the `isJsonSerialized` parameter to `false`. 這樣可避免使用函數，針對每個傳送到用戶端的字串。This avoids the need to use the function for each string that is sent to the client. 如需 JSON 格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[JSON 簡介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297)網站。For more information about the JSON format, see the [Introducing JSON](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297) Web site. 只能在非同步回傳期間呼叫方法。The method can be called only during an asynchronous postback. 若要判斷是否為非同步回傳，使用屬性。To determine whether a postback is asynchronous, use the property. 使用註冊資料項目方法可以存取期間的用戶端指令碼處理、 和物件的事件。The data items that are registered by using the method can be accessed in client script during the , , and events of the object. 當您處理這些事件時，事件引數物件中傳遞自訂資料。When you handle these events, the custom data is passed in an event argument object. 比方說，如果您提供的事件處理常式，則會傳遞自訂資料在類別中，會公開屬性。For example, if you provide a handler for the event, the custom data is passed in the class, which exposes a property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將資料傳送至兩個非同步回傳期間的頁面上的控制項。The following example shows how to send data to two controls on a page during an asynchronous postback. 控制項不是內部控制項。The controls are not inside an control. 此範例顯示的多載不接受`isJsonSerialized`參數。This example shows the overload that does not take the `isJsonSerialized` parameter. 否則，程序來擷取物件的屬性會是相同，因為如果您未使用該多載。Otherwise, the procedure for retrieving the property of the object is the same as if you did not use that overload. > [!NOTE] > 此範例中傳送的資料是僅供說明。The data that is sent in this example is for illustration only. 在真實世界的應用程式，您會使用方法，以從伺服器傳送自訂資料。In a real-world application, you would use the method to send custom data from the server. 例如，您可以使用傳送有關是否要隱藏或顯示用戶端不是內部的項目資訊的資料項目控制項。For example, you could use the data item to send information about whether to hide or show client elements that are not inside an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem/CS/ScriptManagerRegisterDataItemCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem/VB/ScriptManagerRegisterDataItemVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，登錄`dispose`控制項內的指令碼控制項。Use the method to register `dispose` scripts for controls that are inside an control. 在非同步回傳期間控制項可以進行更新、 刪除，或建立。During asynchronous postbacks, controls can be updated, deleted, or created. 當更新或刪除任何面板`dispose`註冊指令碼會在內部的控制項稱為。When a panel is updated or deleted, any `dispose` scripts that are registered for controls that are inside the are called. 在典型網頁開發的情況下，您不需要呼叫方法。In typical page development scenarios, you do not have to call the method. 方法是由控制項開發人員若要註冊指令碼或建立繼承的控制項時用於介面。The method is intended for use by control developers to register script or create controls that inherit from the interface. 例如，您可能會使用`dispose`編寫指令碼，如果您使用複合開發的用戶端控制項。For example, you might use a `dispose` script if you develop a client control by using composition. 在您的控制項，您會實作和呈現個別控制項。In your control, you implement and render individual controls. 您註冊`dispose`任何的方法項目，並未對應到定義的用戶端元件這類`Sys.TextBox`。You register the `dispose` method of any item that does not correspond to a defined client component such as `Sys.TextBox`. 如果您的自訂控制項撰寫對應至用戶端元件中的項目[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]，您沒有註冊`dispose`編寫指令碼，因為`dispose`會自動呼叫。If your custom control composes elements that correspond to client components in the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)], you do not have to register a `dispose` script, because `dispose` is called automatically. 因此，使用方法一部分的用戶端元件[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]且無法再使用元件時，釋放資源。Therefore, use the method for client components that are part of the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used. 方法可以多次呼叫控制項。The method can be called multiple times for a control. 多個指令碼會彙總。Multiple scripts are aggregated. 處置指令碼的順序必須符合已註冊的指令碼的順序。The order of disposing scripts matches the order in which the scripts were registered. 如果您註冊`dispose`指令碼的控制項，不是處於控制項，擲回例外狀況。If you register a `dispose` script for a control that is not in an control, an exception is thrown. `dispose`之間呼叫指令碼的類別和事件。The `dispose` script is called between the and events of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用註冊具有局部網頁呈現，且相容的控制項的自訂 (expando) 屬性的方法沒有任何[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。You use the method to register a custom (expando) property for a control that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies. 方法註冊為指定之控制項的自訂屬性的名稱/值組。The method registers a name/value pair as a custom attribute for the specified control. 屬性是動態設定從 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 以保留呈現的控制項的標記的 XHTML 相容性。The property is set dynamically from ECMAScript (JavaScript) to preserve XHTML compatibility for the rendered control's markup. 設定`encode`至`true`如果您必須逸出動態屬性的值中的任何字元。Set `encode` to `true` if you have to escape any characters in the dynamic property's value. 如果找不到的動態屬性將加入的控制項，就會發生指令碼錯誤。If the control to which the dynamic property will be added is not found, a script error occurs.

ASP.NET Ajax 擴充項控制項必須註冊參與局部網頁呈現。An ASP.NET Ajax extender control must be registered to participate in partial-page rendering. 方法會將指定的擴充項控制項擴充項控制項和它們所擴充的目標指令碼控制項的內部清單。The method adds the specified extender control to an internal list of extender controls and the target script controls they extend. 這份清單會在處理事件。This list is processed during the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增會提交表單時之前, 執行的指令碼可讓您修改提交或取消它。The adds script that is executed before the form is submitted, which lets you modify the submission or cancel it. 您使用方法以呈現`onsubmit`陳述式相容於局部網頁呈現，且具有無[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。You use the method to render an `onsubmit` statement that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies. 使用此方法註冊的 JavaScript 程式碼傳送至網頁時，才會註冊陳述式的控制項內正在更新的控制項。JavaScript code that is registered by using this method is sent to the page only when the control that is registering the statement is inside an control that is being updated. 若要向每次非同步回傳的程式碼，使用這個方法多載。To register code with every asynchronous postback, use the overload of this method. 如果您想要註冊 JavaScript 程式碼，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊此程式碼一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間使用方法類別。If you want to register JavaScript code that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the code only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 您可以取得的參考物件從頁的屬性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. *指令碼*參數方法可以包含多個指令碼命令所使用分號 （;） 分隔。The *script* parameter of the method can contain multiple script commands that are delimited by using semicolons (;). 如需有關 HTML 表單和`onsubmit`事件，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about HTML forms and the `onsubmit` event, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用註冊啟動指令碼區塊與局部網頁呈現，頁面的方法沒有任何[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。You use the method to register a startup script block for a page that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies. 使用此方法註冊的啟動指令碼區塊會傳送至頁面時，才會註冊在區塊的控制項內正在更新的控制項。Startup script blocks that are registered by using this method are sent to the page only when the control that is registering the block is inside an control that is being updated. 若要註冊啟動指令碼區塊每次非同步回傳發生時，使用這個方法多載。To register a startup script block every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the overload of this method. 如果您想要註冊啟動指令碼，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊指令碼一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間使用方法類別。If you want to register a startup script that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script only one time during initial page rendering, use the method of the class. 您可以取得的參考物件從頁的屬性。You can get a reference to the object from the property of the page. 指令碼區塊所呈現方法執行時在網頁完成載入，但在網頁的用戶端之前`onload`就會引發事件。The script block that is rendered by the method executes when the page finishes loading but before the page's client `onload` event is raised. 啟動指令碼區塊之前都位於呈現 ASP.NET 網頁底部``標記。Startup script blocks are located at the bottom of the rendered ASP.NET page just before the `` tag. 使用註冊的啟動指令碼區塊不保證其所註冊的順序相同的輸出。Startup script blocks that are registered by using are not guaranteed to be output in the same order in which they are registered. 如果啟動指令碼區塊的順序很重要，使用物件來收集在單一字串中，指令碼區塊，然後所有做為單一啟始指令碼來註冊它們。If the order of the startup script blocks is important, use a object to gather the script blocks in a single string, and then register them all as a single startup script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定是否控制項應該呈現偵錯或發行版本的用戶端指令碼程式庫。The property specifies whether the control should render debug or release versions of client script libraries. 此值可由頁面指示詞和組態檔中所設定的值取代。This value can be superseded by values that are set in the configuration file and in the page directive. 下表列出這個屬性的有效值。The following table lists the valid values for this property. |值Value|定義Definition| |-----------|----------------| ||偵錯版本的用戶端程式庫用來在網頁中的指令碼時`retail`之組態項目的屬性設為`false`。Debug versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page when the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `false`. 否則，會使用用戶端指令碼程式庫的發行版本。Otherwise, the release versions of client script libraries are used.| ||當套用至屬性物件，這個值為相同。When applied to the property of the object, this value is the same as .| ||偵錯版本的用戶端指令碼程式庫會使用網頁中，除非`retail`之組態項目的屬性設為`true`。Debug versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page unless the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `true`.| ||除非在網頁中使用發行版本的用戶端指令碼程式庫`retail`之組態項目的屬性設為`false`。Release versions of client script libraries are used in the Web page unless the `retail` attribute of the configuration element is set to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > `debug`指示詞屬性不會影響已啟用 Ajax 的 ASP.NET 應用程式。The `debug` attribute of the directive does not affect Ajax-enabled ASP.NET applications. 控制項使用只有設定 Web.config 檔案中，然後在其和屬性，以決定是否要呈現偵錯指令碼。The control uses only the settings in the Web.config file and in its and properties to determine whether to render debug scripts. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[偵錯和追蹤 Ajax 應用程式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375)。For more information, see [Debugging and Tracing Ajax Applications Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定 absolute，相對的或在頁面上封鎖所有的指令碼的應用程式相對 URL。The property enables you to specify an absolute, relative, or application-relative URL for all script blocks on the page. 這包括自訂和第三方指令碼區塊與目前登錄執行個體。This includes custom and third-party script blocks that are registered with the current instance. 屬性通常以宣告方式做為屬性的設定`ScriptManager`元素在頁面上，但它可以將程式碼中也。The property is typically set declaratively as an attribute of a `ScriptManager` element on the page, but it can be set in code also. 如果`path`屬性或屬性會設為物件存放至集合、 路徑值會覆寫值執行個體。If the `path` attribute or the property is set for a object in the collection, the path value overrides the value for that instance. 如果沒有指定值，則控制項搜尋所定義的目錄屬性並解析指令碼參考其或屬性。If no value is specified, the control searches the directory that is defined by the property and resolves script references by their or properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態屬性會傳回物件，可包含代表指令碼資源 （指令碼重新導向） 的位置對應的集合。The static property returns a object that can contain a collection of mappings that represent the location of the script resource (script redirection). 可以根據名稱或名稱/組件組對應的對應此集合，並且可指向物件。This collection of mappings can be mapped based on names or name/assembly pairs, and it can point to a object. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何加入可以所參考的物件物件。The following examples shows how to add a object that can be referenced by a object. 將下列程式碼加入至 Global.asax 檔案中`Application_Start`事件。Add the following code to the Global.asax file in the `Application_Start` event. ```csharp ScriptResourceDefinition myScriptResDef = new ScriptResourceDefinition(); myScriptResDef.Path = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.min.js"; myScriptResDef.DebugPath = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.js"; myScriptResDef.CdnPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.min.js"; myScriptResDef.CdnDebugPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.js"; ScriptManager.ScriptResourceMapping.AddDefinition("jquery", null, myScriptResDef); ``` ```vb Dim myScriptResDef As New ScriptResourceDefinition() myScriptResDef.Path = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.min.js" myScriptResDef.DebugPath = "~/Scripts/jquery-1.4.2.js" myScriptResDef.CdnPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.min.js" myScriptResDef.CdnDebugPath = "http://ajax.microsoft.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-1.4.2.js" ScriptManager.ScriptResourceMapping.AddDefinition("jquery", Nothing, myScriptResDef) ``` 在 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁 （.aspx 檔） 標記，加入下列標記內`form`項目和之前的任何項目或使用 jQuery 指令碼的程式碼。In the markup for an ASP.NET Web Forms page (.aspx file), add the following markup inside the `form` element and before any elements or code that uses jQuery script. ``` ```

summary.span: 取得 物件，該物件包含許多 物件，而每個物件都代表一個要呈現給用戶端的指令碼檔。

span.span: Gets a object that contains the objects, each of which represents a script file rendered to the client.

value.span: 執行個體的 物件。

span.span: The object of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的物件是集合物件，其中每一個都代表指令碼檔案。The object that is returned by this property is a collection of objects, each of which represents a script file. 集合包含為了獲得 Ajax 功能 ASP.NET 所需的所有指令碼檔案及自訂指令碼檔案的參考。The collection includes references to all the script files that ASP.NET needs for Ajax functionality, and to custom script files. 要呈現的自訂指令碼檔中可以定義控制項或在相關聯控制項。Custom script files to render can be defined in the control or in an associated control. 您可以將指令碼檔案中標記的集合加入加`asp:ScriptReference`項目`Scripts`節點內`asp:ScriptManager`元素在頁面上，如下列範例所示。You can add script files to the collection in markup by adding `asp:ScriptReference` elements to a `Scripts` node inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 您也可以加入物件集合以程式設計方式利用方法類別。You can also add a object to the collection programmatically by using the method of the class. 期間控制項的控制暫存器的指令碼檔案事件。The control registers script files during the control's event. 集合未包含核心[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]指令碼。The collection does not contain the core [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] scripts. 核心程式庫中的指令碼會自動; 轉譯它們不需要向控制項。The scripts in the core library are rendered automatically; they do not have to be registered with the control. 不過，如果您想要覆寫核心指令碼或控制項的任何指令碼，並以取代指令碼的不同版本，您可以加入至版本集合。However, if you want to override a core script or any control script and substitute a different version of the script, you can add your version to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的運作方式類似方法類別。The method works like the method for the class. 這兩種方法具有指定之識別碼將控制項設在網頁上作用中的控制項。Both methods make the control with the specified ID the active control on the Web page. 方法類別用來將焦點設在非同步回傳期間。The method of the class is used to set focus during an asynchronous postback. 在回傳，當第一次呈現的頁面，方法呼叫方法類別。During postbacks and when the page is first rendered, the method calls the method of the class. 如果有多個呼叫方法，最後一次呼叫中的控制項焦點。If there are multiple calls to the method, the control in the last call receives focus.
